title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.7 - Strict compliance with speed limits required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.7 - Strict compliance with speed limits required

State Regulations

Vehicles at an air terminal shall be operated in strict
compliance with speed limits prescribed by the Port Authority as indicated by
posted traffic signs. No vehicle shall exceed the speed of 20 miles per hour on
the public ramp and apron area, public passenger ramp and apron area, public
cargo ramp and apron area, public aircraft parking or storage
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1262.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
